Text:
Hi there. Great upload. Would you be able to tell me the exact, character-for-character name of the DVD, that comes up when you insert the disk into your computer?

Cheers,
Franklint

@Darktangent2:
In case you didn't see my comment on the other upload of this DVD, you will need to either burn the VIDEO_TS folder to a DVD, or use an application like VLC to open the folder and play it as though it were a commercial DVD. Good luck.
